portal 3 or portal VR, 秋梨膏

I personally loved every minute of Portal 2. Each puzzle was great and I thought the story was good too! I also all of the optional things to do like trying to find Ratman's dens, Co op, the lore behind Cave Johnson, GLaDOS and Aperture Science and the ability to make your own test chambers. I think the characters are well written as well like Cave Johnson. Overall I would recommend this game to anyone!
친구가 없어도 재밌고, 친구가 있다면 더 재미있는게임
great puzzle game... no need for more details lol
Brilliant! One of the best games I've ever played so far, the story is phenomenal, puzzles are so well made and such fun multiplayer mode I just love everything about this game!
Absolutely amazing game! Great story, character development, puzzles. Such a fantastic addition to the first game. I only wish they had a 3rd. But hey, one can still hope.

Esse jogo tem portais




Logo... Ele é bom

Just like the first Portal, Portal 2 is a FPS-puzzle game and just like it's predeccesor, a game you absolutely have to play. It's like the first game, just with a ton more mechanics which are still easy to understand but hard to master. The Main Story is actually longer than the first one and has an additional Multiplayer campaign. Graphics were also imrpoved from the first game. Voice acting is just as amazing as always. And the story... Oh boy, it's good. It picks up where the first game left and expands alot on the lore. I personally didn't experience any bugs whilst playing.

So, in conclusion, play it. And hell, play the first part if you haven't done so already. Do it.
One of the best PC games ever made, great story, great puzzels 10/10.
Gud Game but hard very much :3
117 hours... I accidently left computer on for a bit so more like 10 hours but this game is still great
ideal para cualquer fan que halla disfrutado del primero

gelocity workshop maps are amazing. game itself is god tier, recently realised i never actually finished it, and completing the last levels was a straight pleasure. wish the minecraft version was as good as this one.
Great Story and you can have lots of fun with your friends in the multiplayer

Гениально! 

Эта игра хороша во всём. Потрясающий геймплей, захватывающий сюжет, интересные персонажи, за репликами которых наблюдать одно удовольствие. Правда, есть рандомные дефекты в русской озвучке(иногда реплика резко обрывается или звучит фраза, которая не относится к данному моменту), но это простительно, ведь это одна из крутейших локализаций игр из тех, что мне довелось слышать. 

Я купил игру после нескольких прохождений пиратки. Но даже проходя её раз в четвертый она мне ни капли не надоела. Рекомендую всем к прохождению, не пожалеете. 

10 лимонов, которыми одарила меня жизнь из 10

Um jogo extremamente perfeito, magnifico, recomendo para todos os jogadores, de todas as idades e gostos.
Portal 2 é um jogo muito bom para exercitar o cérebro, por sua quantidade de puzzles e etc.
Me gustó. Cada prueba requiere esfuerzo e ingenio.

Portal 2 is the best puzzle game I've ever played. I just love the setting of the story so much! Being in a destroyed underground science facility is a very original and enjoyable addition to the portal games. I still love Portal 1, but it just doesn't have the same sort of atmosphere that Portal 2 has. Portal 1 is too perfect. Portal 2 is just right!
